name: Discovery & Empathy
description: A deep dive into your business goals, audience, and current setup. Includes a practical action plan.

name: Branding
description: Logo, colours, and simple identity guidelines to give you a consistent look.

name: Website
description: Design and build, fully branded, easy to update, mobile-ready.

name: SEO Setup
description: Local search setup, keyword planning, and basic on-page optimisation.

name: Email Setup
description: Email templates, list building tools, and guidance on sending campaigns.

name: CRM Setup & Training
description: Select, configure, and train you on the right CRM for your business.

name: Content Assets
description: Social graphics, templates, and planning tools.

name: Workspace + Domain
description: Set up professional email, domain, and cloud tools.

name: Paid Media Setup
description: Social or search ad setup with budgets you control.

name: Training (per session)
description: Focused training on tools, content, or workflows.

name: Ad hoc Tasks
description: One-off edits, small changes, extra meetings, or iterations.
